summary: The New England Patriots are a popular American football team from Boston, Massachusetts. They play in the NFL's AFC East division. The team has been very successful, winning six Super Bowls, which is tied for the most in NFL history. They have a great coach, Bill Belichick, and a famous quarterback, Tom Brady, who led the team to many wins between 2001 and 2019. The Patriots play at Gillette Stadium in Foxborough and have a lot of passionate fans. They've sold out every home game since 1994!
title: New England Patriots
